title: Creative Filters Photography Tutorial Intro
summary: Lindsay Adler introduces a Learn+ episode dedicated to exploring creative filters in photography. She demonstrates how to use tools like star filters, diffusion filters, and kaleidoscopes to achieve unique in-camera effects.

steps.action: Introduction to the concept of using creative filters for in-camera creativity.
Overview of specific filters covered: star filters, diffusion filters, and kaleidoscopes.
Showcase of star filter effects creating light bursts on a sequined outfit.
Showcase of diffusion filter effects creating a soft, dreamy glow.
Showcase of kaleidoscope filter effects creating fractured, multi-image portraits.

key_takeaways: Creative filters allow for artistic effects directly in-camera.
Star filters add sparkle and light bursts to highlights.
Diffusion filters soften the image for a dreamy look.
Kaleidoscope filters create abstract, multi-faceted images.
